description:
Is it just a system-tray icon to launch Kate? Is that all it does? Why? I see no use for that... I also see NO man-pages, NO info-docs, and NO other docs to tell me there's something I overlooked.

So I give up and remove it...

I have seen keyboard shortcuts more interesting than this...
That is the best editor that I have ever used in my entire life. This editor is so good that I am breaking up with my girlfriend.
